items.title: Sunrisers Leeds retain Brook and Carse for Hundred
items.summary: Sunrisers Leeds retain England men's multi-format players Harry Brook and Brydon Carse for the 2026 edition of The Hundred with Daniel Vettori the franchise's new head coach.

items.title: Are 'efficient' Chelsea ready to chase down titles?
